article_node.title: Sokoman Minerals Corp. Expands Land Position at Crippleback Lake
article_node.summary: Sokoman Minerals Corp. has secured two property purchase agreements to expand its land holdings at Crippleback Lake, adding 105 mineral claims from United Gold Inc. and 74 claims from David Evans. The deals involve cash and share payments, with a 1% net‑shale‑rights royalty on the Evans property. The company now controls over 13,000 hectares at Crippleback Lake and plans immediate geophysical surveys and mapping to advance a copper‑gold play.
